titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: DIASTOLIC BLOOD PRESSURE - Description

body.p: DIASTOLIC BLOOD PRESSURE is the result of the Clinical Investigation which measures the PATIENT 's Diastolic Blood Pressure , where the UNIT OF MEASUREMENT is ' Millimetres of mercury (mmHg) '.
This item is not referenced in a data set in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary. It has been retained for information.
